topic.title: Footnotes

p.u: superseded by Chapter 1 of the Conceptual Framework. References to the Framework are to IASC’s Framework for the Preparation and Presentation of Financial Statements, adopted by the IASB in 2001. In September 2010 the IASB replaced the Framework with the Conceptual Framework for Financial Reporting.

References to the Framework in this Basis for Conclusions are to the IASC’s Framework for the Preparation and Presentation of Financial Statements, adopted by the IASB in 2001 and in effect when the Interpretation was developed.
